body: I have been timing out a lot. wtf Is going on. It's ridiculous
body_tagged: I have been timing out a lot. wtf Is going on. It's ridiculous
title: Having timing out problems.

replies.body: I know right...but there are a lot of forums posts about this and staff are working on fixing it.
replies.body_tagged: I know right...but there are a lot of forums posts about this and staff are working on fixing it.

replies.body: The staff are aware of this issue.
replies.body_tagged: The staff are aware of this issue.

replies.body:
Here is how you fix it. 

1) Get a wrench
2) Go hug a tree
3) Put the wrench in the tree
4) Hit the tree with the wrench
5) When the tree falls down, it makes a sound
6) That sounds is heard by the lag
7) The lag gets scurred and leave
8) We no longer time out
9) We can now play
10) We can now kill

Your welcome
